text: Joe McElderry (born 16 June 1991) is an English singer. He was born in South Shields, Tyne and Wear. He won the 2009 series of singing competition The X Factor UK. He is openly gay.Joe McElderry ends sexuality rumours ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:English pop musicians Category:English singers Category:English LGBT people Category:Gay men Category:LGBT musicians Category:Musicians from Tyne and Wear Category:The X Factor contestants
title: Joe McElderry
